column2: "Afei iyi nye mbrasɛm
column3: ahyɛdze
column4: nye atsɛmbu a EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn hyɛɛ dɛ wɔmfa nkyerɛkyerɛ hom
column5: na hom nyɛ no wɔ asaase a hom rutwa mu akɛfa no do:"

column2: "na eesuro EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn
column3: eedzi n’ahyɛdze nye ne mbransɛm a merehyɛ wo yi nyinara do
column7: wo nkwa nda nyinara; na wo nda aawar."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi
column3: Israel tsie
column4: na dwen do yɛ; na eesi wo yie
column7: w’egyanom Nyankopɔn abɔ wo anohoba no
column8: wɔ asaase a numfonsu nye ewo pem wɔ do no do."

column2: "Israel
column3: tsie: EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn yɛ EWURADZE kor:"

column2: "na fa w’akoma nyinara
column3: na ɔnye wo kra nyinara na ɔnye w’ahoɔdzen nyinara dɔ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn."

column2: "Na nsɛm yi a merehyɛ wo ndɛ da yi
column3: ɔnko w’akoma do;"

column2: "na fa kyerɛkyerɛ wo mba yie
column3: na twetwe ho nkɔmbɔ aber a etse wo fie
column4: nye aber a enam ɔkwan mu

column2: "Na fa yɛ asɛnkyerɛdze bɔ w’abaw do
column3: na ɔnyɛ w’enyiwa ntamu nkaakyekyeree."

column2: "Na kyerɛw no wɔ wo fie mpondua ho
column3: nye wo mbobotsen ho."

column2: "Na ɔbɛba dɛ
column3: sɛ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dze wo du asaase a ɔkaa ho ntam kyerɛɛ w’egyanom
column6: dɛ ɔdze rema wo no do; nkurow akɛse fɛɛfɛw a nnyɛ ɔwo na ekyekyeree
column8: "nye adan a ndzepa nyinara ahyɛ no amaama a nnyɛ ɔwo na edze hyɛɛ mu
column9: nye mbura a woetutu a nnyɛ ɔwo na itutui
column10: wenyin nture nye  olive   ndua a nnyɛ ɔwo na etsetsɛwee
column11: na sɛ idzidzi na emee a;"

column2: "ɔno hwɛ yie bɛyɛ na wo werɛ efir EWURADZE a oyii wo fii Egypt asaase do
column3: wɔ nkowaasom ofi mu no."

column2: "Suro EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn; na ɔno na som no
column3: na ka ne dzin ho ntam."

column2: "Mma hom nndzi enyame fofor a wofi aman a woetwa hom ho ehyia no enyame mu ekyir;"
"na EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn a ɔwɔ wo mu no yɛ Nyame nyinkufo; bɛyɛ na EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn ebufuw adzɛw wɔ wo do
column3: na ɔasɛɛ wo efi asaase enyi."

column2: "Mma hom nnsɔ EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn nnhwɛ
column3: dɛ mbrɛ hom sɔɔ no hwɛe wɔ Massa no."

column2: "Hom ndzi EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn ne mbransɛm
column3: nye ne dasesɛm
column4: nye n’ahyɛdze a ɔdze ahyɛ wo no do yie."

column2: "Na yɛ dza ɔtsen na oye wɔ EWURADZE enyiwa do; na eesi wo yie
column3: na aakɔ akɛfa asaase pa a EWURADZE kaa ho ntam kyerɛɛ w’egyanom no

column2: "Sɛ daakye bi wo babanyin bisa wo dɛ
column3: Dasesɛm nye ahyɛdze
column4: nye atsɛmbu a EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn dze hyɛɛ hom yi ase nye dɛn a?"

column2: "Ɔno se wo ba no dɛ
column3: Nna yɛyɛ Farao no nkowaa wɔ Egypt; na EWURADZE dze nsa a ɔyɛ dzen yii hɛn fii Egypt:"

column2: "na EWURADZE kyerɛɛ nsɛnkyerɛdze nye anwanwadze
column3: akɛse yayaayaw

column2: "na oyii hɛn fii hɔ dɛ ɔdze hɛn reba
column3: dze asaase a ɔkaa ho ntam kyerɛɛ hɛn egyanom abɛma hɛn."

column2: "Na EWURADZE hyɛɛ hɛn dɛ yɛnyɛ ahyɛdze yi nyinara
column3: yensuro EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn
column6: dɛ mbrɛ ɔtse ndɛ da yi."

column2: "Na ɔbɛyɛ tsenenee ama hɛn
column3: sɛ yɛdwen do dzi mbrasɛm yi nyinara do wɔ EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn enyim
column4: dɛ mbrɛ ɔahyɛ hɛn no a."
